brand_identity.location: Hudson Street, West Village, Manhattan, NYC

do: Address customers as neighbors and friends
Share the story behind our products
Use sensory language (warm, fresh, flaky, aromatic)
Include community references (West Village, Hudson Street)
Mention sustainability and local sourcing when relevant
dont: Use overly formal or corporate language
Be overly casual or use excessive slang

good: Fresh from our oven this morning
We've been perfecting this recipe since 2015
Made with love on Hudson Street
Join us for your morning ritual
avoid: You won't find better anywhere else

banned_content_types: discriminatory language (age, race, gender, disability, religion)
false urgency tactics ('only 2 left', 'expires in 1 hour' when untrue)

required_disclaimers.allergens: All marketing materials mentioning specific products must include: 'Contains allergens. See full ingredient list at hudsonstreetbakery.com or ask in-store.'
required_disclaimers.dietary_claims: When mentioning vegan/gluten-free products: 'Prepared in a facility that handles wheat, dairy, eggs, and tree nuts. Cross-contamination may occur.'
required_disclaimers.seasonal_products: For seasonal items: 'Available for a limited time while supplies last.'
required_disclaimers.offers: All promotional offers must include: 'One per customer. Cannot be combined with other offers. Valid at Hudson Street location only.'

nyc_legal_requirements.food_safety_disclaimer: Required for prepared food marketing in NYC: 'Made fresh daily in our NYC-licensed commercial kitchen.'
nyc_legal_requirements.calorie_posting: If calorie information is included, it must be accurate and based on standard serving sizes per NYC Health Code Article 81.50
nyc_legal_requirements.truth_in_menu: All ingredient and preparation claims must be accurate per NYC Consumer Affairs regulations
nyc_legal_requirements.accessibility: Digital marketing must meet WCAG 2.1 Level AA accessibility standards per NYC Local Law 26

pastries.explanation: Pastry margins are tight; max 20% or $2 off

drinks.explanation: Beverage costs are fixed; max 10% or $1 off

bundles.explanation: Bundle discounts can go up to 25% for combo offers (e.g., coffee + pastry)

offer_frequency_limits.email_campaigns: Maximum 2 promotional emails per month per customer segment
offer_frequency_limits.SMS_campaigns: Maximum 1 SMS per month per customer (higher opt-out sensitivity)
offer_frequency_limits.loyalty_offers: Loyalty members can receive up to 4 offers per month

prohibited_offers: Buy one get one free (BOGO) - devalues products
More than 25% off any individual item
Coupons with expiration less than 7 days
Offers targeting only new customers (loyalty program concern)
approved_offer_types: Free item with purchase (e.g., free coffee with 2 pastries)
Loyalty points multipliers (e.g., double points this week)
Early access to seasonal items for loyal customers
Free birthday treat for loyalty members

imagery_requirements.photo_style: Natural lighting, rustic aesthetic, show product texture
imagery_requirements.must_include: Branding elements (logo, bakery interior, staff when appropriate)

allowed: Reference to past purchase categories (e.g., 'We know you love our croissants')
Location-based references (e.g., 'Perfect for your morning walk from [neighborhood]')
prohibited: Health or dietary assumptions beyond stated preferences

control_requirements.control_definition: Current best-performing variant or brand-standard template
control_requirements.explanation: Testing more than 3 variants (including control) dilutes sample size

stopping_rules.early_stop_if_unsubscribe_spike: If any variant sees >5% unsubscribe rate, stop immediately
stopping_rules.early_stop_if_clear_winner: If one variant reaches 95% confidence before test end date, can stop early

loyal_customers.offer_types: Early access, loyalty multipliers, personalized recommendations
loyal_customers.tone: Familiar, warm, like talking to a regular
loyal_customers.frequency: Can sustain higher contact frequency (up to weekly)

students.offer_types: Student discounts, bundle deals, morning specials
students.frequency: Weekly during school year, reduced in summer

pre_send_verification: ✓ All product claims are accurate and verifiable
✓ Allergen disclaimer included if products mentioned
✓ Cross-contamination warning present for dietary claims
✓ CTA is approved and not manipulative
✓ Offer expiration date is at least 7 days out

rag_grounding_requirements.citation_mandate: All product information must cite 'Hudson Street Bakery Inventory v1' as source

accuracy_requirements.prices: Must be current as of last inventory update
accuracy_requirements.ingredients: Must be complete and accurate for allergen safety

prohibited_fabrications: Ingredients or allergen info not verified
rag_grounding_requirements.update_protocol: When product catalog updates, all marketing agents must re-ingest data within 24 hours

related_documents: NYC Consumer Affairs Truth in Menu Regulations
